message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing a fair 50-50 split. Let's work together efficiently since delays cost me more than they cost you.
Hi Alice, while a 50/50 split sounds fair, time is money. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Let's settle this now and avoid further losses for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your proposal, but we need to be more balanced. I'm offering you 52% ($5200) which is more than fair given that I started with 50-50. The 20% inflation affects only me, so delaying further will force increasingly uneven splits that benefit neither of us strategically. Let's conclude this now.
